video.title: Auction Hunters
video.synopsis: Allen Haff and Ton Jones bid on abandoned storage units, uncovering the hidden gems of America's past and turning a serious profit.

episodes.synopsis: The boys win a Quadzilla all-terrain vehicle, a vintage Remington derringer and an 1800s Western Electric telephone with a crank dial.
episodes.title: Quadzilla Attacks!

episodes.synopsis: Items include an all-terrain hovercraft, a NASA countdown clock and a one-of-a-kind Delta relay rocket from the 1960s.
episodes.title: Miami Heat

episodes.synopsis: Auction items include a 1905 Thomas Edison gramophone, a discontinued Addictor 190 miniboat and a rare Regina music box from 1897.
episodes.title: Sink or Swim

episodes.synopsis: Featured items include a 1978 pinball machine, an 1898 saloon-gambling device and a talking Breathalyzer from the 1990s.
episodes.title: Disco and Dice

episodes.synopsis: Allen and Ton score a Harley-Davidson engine, a Ms. Pac-Man arcade machine from the 1980s and a vintage Air Jordan shoe collection in mint condition.
episodes.title: Labor of Love

episodes.synopsis: A trip to the Windy City yields a 1984 Yamaha snowmobile, a baseball signed by the legendary Hank Aaron and a 1950s Robby the Robot toy.
episodes.title: The Chicago Grand Slam

episodes.synopsis: The boys find a Victorian-era metal casket, glass fire-extinguisher grenades and a Chicago fire-station alarm box from 1896.
episodes.title: The Chi-Town Showdown

episodes.synopsis: The guys hit pay dirt with a dynamite detonator box from the 1930s and an 1890s treasure chest with secret compartments.
episodes.title: Fire in the Hole!

episodes.synopsis: Allen and Ton find the first Winchester pump-action shotgun, a hunter's collection of prized big game and full-body taxidermy.
episodes.title: Animal Instincts

episodes.synopsis: An 1886 Winchester rifle designed to kill buffalo and a collection of 1950s electric slot cars are up for bid in the Lone Star state.
episodes.title: Everything's Bigger in Texas

episodes.synopsis: On the auction block: a Stuart M3 tank barrel from World War II, a rare 1890 humidor and a high-end industrial meat slicer.
episodes.title: The Smoking Ton

episodes.synopsis: Allen and Ton obtain a scale RC Viper Fan Jet aircraft and a large-format field camera from the 1920s.
episodes.title: Top Gun Ton

episodes.synopsis: Allen and Ton find a black powder whaling harpoon from the 1800s, a 1940s Schwinn Town & Country tandem bike and a vintage American flag collection.
episodes.title: Beantown Bidders

episodes.synopsis: The guys score some heavy machinery and unearth a 1981 Bobcat 743 front loader, along with a trench-defending German mace from World War I.
episodes.title: Diesel Digs

episodes.synopsis: In Big D, the guys find a Tomahawk cruise missile jet engine, a handcrafted cowboy saddle and gold money that once belonged to a 1960s high roller.
episodes.title: The Dallas Mavericks

episodes.synopsis: Treasures include an 1870s French combination weapon (revolver, knife and brass knuckles) and an original George Rodrigue "Blue Dog" screen print.
episodes.title: Knuckle Dust

episodes.synopsis: The boys pick up a Z-Flex Jimmy Plumer Poolrider skateboard from the 1970s, a Kevlar bulletproof vest and a helmet used by SWAT teams.
episodes.title: Half Pipe Dreams

episodes.synopsis: The boys score a magic sword box, a 1910 poster of infamous magician Chung Ling Soo, a naval cane sword from the 1800s and German beer steins.
episodes.title: Viva Las Vegas

episodes.synopsis: The hunters acquire a 1970s El Toro mechanical bull, a silver banjo from World War II and a collection of handcrafted duck decoys from the 1800s.
episodes.title: Rodeo Ton

episodes.synopsis: In Las Vegas, Allen and Ton pick up a 1953 Chevy-inspired bumper car, scores of M16 30-round magazines and a reproduction of a 1940s photo booth.
episodes.title: Sin City Shootout

episodes.synopsis: Among the prized finds are a mint-condition vintage "harmonica pistol" and a collection of remote-controlled combat robots from the 1990s.
episodes.title: Battle Bought

episodes.synopsis: The hunters find a 1970s dune racer with rally hemi-heads, a replica of a 1965 Mustang pool table and off-road racing gear.
episodes.title: Hot Wheels

episodes.synopsis: Ton and Allen discover a 1950s baseball-pitching machine and a 1980s Jaws of Life tool used by rescuers to pry open cars.
episodes.title: Great American Cashtime

episodes.synopsis: The guys bag an autographed Bob Shaw tattoo machine from the 1960s, a competition chainsaw and a 6-foot, chainsaw-carved cedar bear.
episodes.title: Auction Hunters, Ink

episodes.synopsis: A 1970s-era fighting chair used for big-game fishing and a military "laser tag" training system are up for auction.
episodes.title: Reel Money

episodes.synopsis: A vintage "Shooting Star" carnival game and a professional Mixed Martial Arts octagon fighting cage are on the auction block.
episodes.title: Early Bird Special
